home.title: Simple and adaptable feline placeholders
home.description: Just specify your desired image size (width and height) in the URL, and you'll receive a random cat image.
home.tips: Tip: To get a square image, just add one size.
home.toggle_description: Toggle me to get the same specific image everytime
